name: the stony shore pullover
notes:
description: the stony shore pullover is the sister design to the stony shore cardigan! it has a cozy oversized fit with cute balloon style sleeves. the stitch gives a beautiful and fun texture. beginner friendly and fun to make!

[this pattern is free on my blog!][1]

[this pattern is available as a kit with lionbrand!][2] it comes with all the yarn you need to make your pullover + the pdf digital download of the pattern. you can even customize your yarn color!

this pattern has a [full video tutorial on youtube!][3]


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/the-stony-shore-pullover-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: http://shrsl.com/3ef5v
  [3]: https://youtu.be/tdavuyp_8xe
